projects.title: Clock_for_ChoiceScript
projects.description: A clock module allowing you to easily change the time and date with a single call to a subroutine, and then dynamically write it into your text. Users can define their own calendrical systems, date and time stamp formatting, and even use a pseudo-unix timestamp. Written in Choicescript.

projects.title: The Telling
projects.description: An interactive fiction short story written for a Halloween 2025 game jam. Written in ChoiceScript.

projects.title: The Cube: An Escape Room
projects.description: A Roblox escape room game in a randomly generated room, with randomly generated puzzles.

projects.title: Chimps!: The Sanctuary
projects.description: A Roblox animal rpg whre you play as a Chimpanzee, explore the jungle, eat fruit to survive, join a troop and fight for territory. Currently a Demo.
